br.uff.tempo.middleware.management
Class ResourceRegister

java.lang.Object
  Service
      br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.ResourceAgent
          br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.ResourceRegister
All Implemented Interfaces:
IResourceAgent, IResourceRegister, java.io.Serializable
public class ResourceRegister
extends ResourceAgent
implements IResourceRegister

Resource Register Service class. It's the interface to add and remove ResourceData from ResourceRepository instance in a SmartServer
